en.name: Skyward Pride
en.passiveDescription: Increases all DMG by {{8%//10%//12%//14%//16%}}. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does {{80%//100%//120%//140%//160%}} of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

zh.name: 天空之傲
zh.passiveDescription: 造成的伤害提高{{8%//10%//12%//14%//16%}}；施放元素爆发后：普通攻击和重击命中时会发出真空刃，对路径上的敌人造成{{80%//100%//120%//140%//160%}}攻击力的伤害，持续20秒或直至发出8次真空刃。
